resources.string: Make sets of three of the same suit in descending order. Ace can be high or low. The last card of the set is the score card. Use the hold slot to keep a card between draws.

The Images thanks to: 
 Vectorized Playing Cards 2.0 - http://sourceforge.net/projects/vector-cards/
